meanings.definition: One who uses a pencil to draw or sketch.
meanings.sent1: The penciler carefully sketched the outline of the tree.
meanings.sent2: The talented penciler drew a beautiful portrait of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The penciler's pencil danced across the paper, bringing the scene to life.
meanings.sent4: As the penciler's hand moved, the pencil whispered secrets of artistry.
meanings.sent5: Watching the penciler work was like witnessing magic on paper.

meanings.definition: A person who is responsible for creating the initial drawings in a comic book or graphic novel.
meanings.sent1: The penciler sketched the first draft of the superhero's costume design.
meanings.sent2: In the comic industry, the penciler plays a crucial role in setting the visual tone.
meanings.sent3: The penciler joked that even superheroes need a good fashion consultant.
meanings.sent4: The penciler's drawings were the building blocks of the comic world.
meanings.sent5: The penciler's imagination knew no bounds when creating characters.
